title: The Girl Across the Street
description: Tim and Ashlee have lived across the street from each other since they were four years old, they are best friends and over the years have shared everything together from birthday parties to graduations. So itâ€™s no surprise that as they mature and graduate from high school their friendship has blossomed into something more than a simple friendship. Tim has struggled with hiding his love for her for fear it will complicate their friendship and closeness, so he is afraid to tell her his true feelings. Should he confess his love for her or just watch as she grows into a beautiful girl dating others as he anguishes with his secret. Ultimately the unthinkable happens and Tim must move on with his life as he recovers and is faced with new challenges, challenges that will again test his struggles to hide his feelings. As he enjoys the life of a young single guy, he is faced with many girls that tempt his feelings but none greater than the new girl across the street. She will not only demand guidance and trust but will tug at his heart the same way as Ashlee. Will he learn from his past experiences to not hide his inner feelings or will he go down the same path and keep his heart to himself.
author: G. Lusby
